headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: advertiser_id Conditional
parameters.description: Either advertiser_id or library_id has to be set. To get pages under an ad account, you must specify the advertiser ID.

parameters.name: library_id Conditional
parameters.description: Either advertiser_id or library_id has to be set. To get pages under a Business Center, you must specify the ID of the form library that contains the page and leads. You can migrate pages and leads from an ad account to a Business Center.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current number of pages. Default value: 1. Value range: â‰¥ 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Default value: 10. Value range: 1-100.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Page status. Enum values: EDITED (draft), PUBLISHED (ready).

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Page title. This field will be used to filter the page that contains the words in the title.

parameters.name: update_time_range
parameters.description: Filter for pages updated in the specified time range.

parameters.name: start Conditional
parameters.description: Required when update_time_range is passed. Start time in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC time). Example: 2024-01-01 00:00:00 .

parameters.name: end Conditional
parameters.description: Required when update_time_range is passed. End time in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC time). Example: 2024-01-01 00:00:00 .

parameters.name: business_type
parameters.description: Page type. Enum values: LEAD_GEN (Instant Form), STORE_FRONT (Storefront Page), APP_PROFILE_PAGE (App Profile Page), TIKTOK_INSTANT_PAGE (Custom Page or Custom TikTok Instant Page), SHOP_ADS_PLP (Shop Ads Product List Page), SHOP_ADS_PDP (Shop Ads Product Detail Page), POP_UP_FORM (Direct Message Page). Default value: LEAD_GEN .

parameters.name: business_types
parameters.description: Page types. Enum values: LEAD_GEN (Instant Form), STORE_FRONT (Storefront Page), APP_PROFILE_PAGE (App Profile Page), TIKTOK_INSTANT_PAGE (Custom Page or Custom TikTok Instant Page), SHOP_ADS_PLP (Shop Ads Product List Page), SHOP_ADS_PDP (Shop Ads Product Detail Page), POP_UP_FORM (Direct Message Page). Note : If it is passed concurrently with business_type , the value of business_type will be ignored.
